training_data_provenance: Trained on historical trading decisions from 2020-2025, sampled from diverse market conditions including bull, bear, and sideways markets. Data sourced from internal decision logs with 70% training, 20% validation, 10% test split.
business_logic_notes: Model predicts BUY or HOLD based on ensemble decision features. Designed for risk management with position sizing integration. See meta_learner_model.md for detailed rationale.

feature_definitions.name: ensemble_confidence
feature_definitions.description: Average confidence score from ensemble decision providers

feature_definitions.name: volatility_index
feature_definitions.description: Market volatility measure based on price fluctuations

feature_definitions.name: trend_strength
feature_definitions.description: Strength of current market trend direction

feature_definitions.name: risk_score
feature_definitions.description: Calculated risk assessment for the position

feature_definitions.name: market_sentiment
feature_definitions.description: Aggregated market sentiment from multiple indicators
